data.title: Purdue Boilermakers
data.meta_description: Kelly Cook Jr.Throws - PRIOR TO PURDUE / AT WILLIAM & MARY FROM 2017-21 USTFCCCA All-Academic Team CoSIDA Academic All-District First Team CAA Academic Honor...
data.text:
PRIOR TO PURDUE / AT WILLIAM & MARY FROM 2017-21

USTFCCCA All-Academic Team

CoSIDA Academic All-District First Team

CAA Academic Honor Roll

Provost Award and Deanâ€™s List

2021 Outdoor Track & Field / As a Junior

CAA Field Athlete of the Year

Most Outstanding Field Athlete of the CAA Championships

CAA Champion: Shot Put

CAA Champion: Hammer Throw

CAA Runner Up: Discus

Placed 17th in the hammer throw at the NCAA East Prelims with a mark of 63.88 meters

Won two conference titles and a silver at the CAA Championships, with wins in the shot put (16.77 meters) and hammer throw (63.16 meters) and a runner-up finish in the discus (48.30 meters)

Had a hammer PR of 65.74 meters

2020-21 Indoor Track & Field / As a Senior

Competed in two meets, with a pair of victories in the weight throw

2020 Outdoor Track & Field / As a Junior

2020 outdoor season canceled due to the global COVID-19 pandemic

2019-20 Indoor Track & Field / As a Junior

IC4A Champion: Shot Put

All-East: Weight Throw

Had shot put PR of 18.20 meters and a weight throw PR of 19.61 meters

2019 Outdoor Track & Field / As a Sophomore

All-America Honorable Mention: Discus

CAA Field Athlete of the Year

Most Outstanding Field Athlete of the CAA Championships

CAA Champion: Discus

CAA Champion: Hammer Throw

NCAA Qualifier: Discus

Placed 24th at the NCAA Championships in the discus with a throw of 51.30 meters

Competed in three events at the NCAA East Prelims, highlighted by a PR of 56.73 meters in the discus to place 12th and qualify for the national championships

Had a PR of 56.73 meters in the discus, 60.70 meters in the hammer and 17.37 meters in the shot put

2018-19 Indoor Track & Field / As a Sophomore

All-East honors in shot put and weight throw

Had a weight throw PR of 18.31 meters and a shot put PR of 17.45 meters

2018 Outdoor Track & Field / As a Freshman

CAA Rookie of the Year

Earned All-CAA accolades

CAA Runner-Up: Discus

CAA Bronze Medal: Shot Put

Finished 25th at the NCAA East Prelims in the discus with a mark of 51.79 meters

Placed sixth in the discus and ninth in the shot put at the USA Track & Field U-20 Championships

2017-18 Indoor Track & Field / As a Freshman

Qualified for the ECAC-IC4A Championships

Had season-bests of 16.88 meters in the weight throw and 16.10 meters in the shot put

HIGH SCHOOL

Four-time Virginia state champion, twice in the shot put and twice in the discus

Broke the school records in both the shot put (58-1) and discuss (178-3)

Also played football and basketball and earned all-state honors as a running back

National Honor Society member

Four-year honor roll awardee

Recipient of the chamber of commerce scholarship

PERSONAL

Parents are Avis and Kelly, Sr.

Has three siblings

Father, Kelly, Sr., played football at VMI

Graduated from William & Mary with a degree in finance

Earning a masters of science degree in finance
